parameters: \nc<Senpai>Alright. Next, I'll show you to your seat.

\nc<Senpai>This is your seat. Please keep it clean. First, try booting
up the computer.

\nc<Saki>(This computer is really old... But it's for work, so I
guess it can't be helped.)

\nc<Senpai>Let's start by setting up this week's schedule. Try
selecting "This Week's Tasks."
Senpai is watching... Let's decide on this week's tasks.
